materials.raw_text:
Barium Carbonate (BaCO3) - 124 g 
 Iron(III) Oxide (Fe2O3) - 130 g 
 Lead(II) Oxide (PbO) - 112 g

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 124 g of Barium Carbonate, 130 g of Iron(III) Oxide, and 112 g of Lead(II) Oxide using a precise scale. 
 2. Combine all three ingredients in a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing container. 
 3. Mix thoroughly using a pestle and mortar or a mechanical mixer until a uniform powder is achieved. 
 4. Ensure no clumps remain in the mixture.

cooling.raw_text:
